snippet: A university dean’s experience dealing with ultraconservative Salafist students on a secular campus offers a window into the larger forces at work in Tunisia today.
abstract: Ultraconservative Salafist students at Manouba University in Tunisian capital Tunis are challenging the more secular inclinations of the school's administrators; the troubles at the university offer a window into the forces at work in Tunisia, as the country tries to build a new order, balancing the freedoms of democracy and Islamist religion.
lead_paragraph: A university dean’s experience dealing with ultraconservative Salafist students on a secular campus offers a window into the larger forces at work in Tunisia today.

headline.seo: Tensions at Manouba University Mirror Turbulence in Tunisia at Large
headline.main: Tensions on a Campus Mirror Turbulence in a New Tunisia
headline.print_headline: Tensions on a Campus Mirror Turbulence in a New Tunisia
